text: int main ( ) { int i , j , k , max , max2 , n , line , test ; int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & test ) ; while ( test -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { printf ( "%d\t" , a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } printf ( "\n" ) ; } while ( n != 1 ) { for ( i = n - 1 , k = i , j = 1 ; k >= 1 ; k -- , j ++ ) { max = a [ i ] [ j ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ; max2 = a [ i ] [ j ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; if ( max2 > max ) max = max2 ; a [ i ] [ j ] = max ; } n -- ; } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; } }
